page.title: 05Industry:Brimsdown 2
page.content: One well established company in Brimsdown is{Johnson Matthey Chemicals who use acids and other chemicals to recover and refine{precious metals.} The by-products of these processes are also sold. Another metallurgical industry{Delta {Cables}using largely copper manufacture all types of{electrical {cables},from the heavy duty power cables to the much thinner wires found in any electrical appliance.Co-axial cables for TV aerial connections are also produced. A third large employer in the area are {Ruberoid}who manufacture roofing materials using tar and recycled paper. {Polylina}make{plasic bags}and similar disposable containers for use in and around the home.
